elements.name: situation1Text
elements.html:
Situation 1

Imagine you want to buy a present for someone who is really important to you, but you don't have enough money. So, you ask a kid in your class if you could please borrow some money. The kid says, 'Okay, wait for me outside the front door after school. I'll bring the money.' As you stand outside waiting, you wonder if the kid will really come.

elements.name: s1_nervous
elements.title: How NERVOUS would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not the kid will show up?

elements.name: s1_mad
elements.title: How MAD would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not the kid will show up?

elements.name: s1_expectation
elements.title: Do you think the kid will show up to give you the money?

elements.name: situation2Text
elements.html:
Situation 2

Imagine that a famous person is coming to visit your school. Your teacher is going to pick five kids to meet this person. You wonder if she will choose you.

elements.name: s2_nervous
elements.title: How NERVOUS would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not your teacher will choose you?

elements.name: s2_mad
elements.title: How MAD would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not your teacher will choose you?

elements.name: s2_expectation
elements.title: Do you think your teacher will choose you to meet the famous person?

elements.name: situation3Text
elements.html:
Situation 3

Imagine you had a really bad fight the other day with a friend. Now you have a serious problem and you wish you had your friend to talk to. You decide to wait for your friend after class and talk with him/her. You wonder if your friend will want to talk to you.

elements.name: s3_nervous
elements.title: How NERVOUS would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not your friend will want to talk to you and listen to your problem?

elements.name: s3_mad
elements.title: How MAD would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not your friend will want to talk to you and listen to your problem?

elements.name: s3_expectation
elements.title: Do you think your friend will want to talk to you and listen to your problem?

elements.name: situation4Text
elements.html:
Situation 4

Imagine it's going to be your birthday soon, and you're hoping to have a party. You decide to ask a few kids from your class to come. You wonder if they'll want to come to your party.

elements.name: s4_nervous
elements.title: How NERVOUS would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not the kids will want to come to your party?

elements.name: s4_mad
elements.title: How MAD would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not the kids will want to come to your party?

elements.name: s4_expectation
elements.title: Do you think the kids will want to come to your party?

elements.name: situation5Text
elements.html:
Situation 5

Imagine you're playing a game with some kids at recess, and you accidentally mess up. The other kids start laughing, and you wonder if they still want you to play with them.

elements.name: s5_nervous
elements.title: How NERVOUS would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not the kids still want you to play with them?

elements.name: s5_mad
elements.title: How MAD would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not the kids still want you to play with them?

elements.name: s5_expectation
elements.title: Do you think the kids still want you to play with them?

elements.name: situation6Text
elements.html:
Situation 6

Imagine you're new at school and you want to make some friends. You see a group of kids talking and laughing during lunch. You walk over and ask if you can sit with them. You wonder if they'll let you join them.

elements.name: s6_nervous
elements.title: How NERVOUS would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not the kids will let you join them?

elements.name: s6_mad
elements.title: How MAD would you feel, RIGHT THEN, about whether or not the kids will let you join them?

elements.name: s6_expectation
elements.title: Do you think the kids will let you join them?
